data.title: Mouth Filled Flavor!
data.text: My wife & I frequent Mezzaterranean on saturdays when we're off, because it so darn good! We split the Fattoush Salad and an order of Chicken Kabobs, as well as an extra order of Hummus and 2 Baklava's. The staff is extra friendly, courteous, and tells you when you arrive: "thanks for coming back". Wow! most places don't pay attention to you when you dine at their establishment occasionally. The place is small, and we could really use a top-notch restaurant like this in Fontana, but it's worth any wait you may have. When we first taste the food we look at each other and say: Umm, Umm, Umm! I will go out on a limb to say that, I don't think that there is a restaurant with more "flavorful food" as Mezzaterranean! They have they the "Old-school" taste- excellence of a mediterranean restaurant with a "New-school" vibe. We smile when we even talk about this restaurant to our friends and colleagues. They definitely are "The new rising" restaurant of Rancho Cucamonga. This is a top-five eatery in Rancho!

data.title: Fabulous food and staff!
data.text: Some of the best mediterrainian food I've ever had!!  Our group had the lamb kabobs, beef kabobs, sambousa, beef shwarma and baklava.  So delish!  ممتاز!!!!

data.title: Great food
data.text: The chicken kabobs, hummus, and salad lunch platter is so good.  very fresh and flavorful.  will definitely be back

data.title: Tasty casual lunch!
data.text: MezzaTerranean is a family owned and operated, small restaurant located in a strip mall.  The food is outstanding and freshly made.  You order at the counter and then staff brings the meal to your table.  Everything we ate was freshly made and absolutely delicious.  I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone that enjoys Middle Eastern food and is seeking a casual meal.  We will definitely dine here again!

data.title: WONDERFUL!!!
data.text: We tried this fantastic little mom and pop for a business lunch today. Every plate and every item was delicious. Our unanimous vote was to return soon, and often. The lentil soup was superb. And everything with the word shawarma in it will be enjoyed. The service, and personal attention of your hosts will make you feel special, too. They really aim to please here, and warm smiles greet you with a welcome and farewell. Judging by the few reviews thus far, this gem hasn't been truly discovered yet. I sure hope it does...not that I relish more people dividing the attention, but this is the kind of place we should all hope has great and enduring success!

data.title: Great food, all we want is more
data.text: Taken out food three times and we are loving exploring the very broad menu.  The hummus is really good.  The Falafels are fresh. We have not been disappointed.  Our only problem is that they close at 7 PM.  I have been there at 6:50 and they wouldn't take my order.   We were disappointed because we know how good the food is.  We would love them to stay open later so... help us pressure them.

data.title: Authentic Mediterranean Food
data.text: I read the reviews about this place on Yelp and was expecting to be pleased. I was greeted immediately by a friendly young lady who was helpful and kind. I ordered a falafel sandwich, hummus and pita bread. Everything was great! I am already looking forward to returning.

data.title: Excellent
data.text:
Pros: Food was superb & prices were excellent.  Chicken kebab entree..Chicken was moist & full of flavor, rice was very good, hummus/pita were very good & the Mediterranean salad was fresh & Crisp. Falafel sandwich was perfect & moist in the center.  Stuffed grape leaves were exactly how I like them.. warm & lemony! Lebni is not my thing but the boyfriend loved it and finished every last drop.
Cons: NO ice available, too tiny for the patrons & we actually got tossed out minutes after our last bite to make the table available for the next patrons waiting (but then they felt bad and brought a free dessert to try).  Short hours: closed on Sundays & only open until 7pm.
Well deserving of their 5 star rating and we'll definitely be back!!!
